about_the_game:
This is the Official Soundtrack for Hacking with Benefits and includes 5 MP3s from the game.

The files are on the "game_directory/soundtrack".

01. Hacker's Motivation.mp3 - 01:38
02. Forward Thrust.mp3 - 01:19
03. A Heavy Loading.mp3 - 01:09
04. Saxing These Moves.mp3 - 01:23
05. Dreaming of Benefits.mp3 - 01:28

Produced by

Yoho Musik Arsenal

content_descriptors.notes: “IARC - 18+ ADULT ONLY. This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. All girls portrayed are 18+ years of age.”
